name: stash
description: Stash is a self-hosted media manager for adult content, providing tagging, scene detection, scrapers, and a modern web interface to organize large libraries.
features: Media library: Organizes and catalogs adult video collections with metadata.
Scene detection: Automatically detects and splits videos into individual scenes.
Tagging system: Tags performers, studios, tags, and categories for organization.
Metadata scrapers: Fetches information from online databases automatically.
Gallery support: Manages image galleries alongside video content.
Marker system: Creates timestamped markers for specific moments in videos.
Duplicate detection: Identifies duplicate files using perceptual hashing.
Plugin system: Extends functionality with community plugins and scrapers.
Web interface: Browses and manages library through modern responsive UI.
Video streaming: Streams content with transcoding for various devices.
Advanced search: Filters content by performers, tags, studios, and custom criteria.
Statistics: Displays library statistics and viewing history analytics.
